content: When fighting as a Monkey won't cut it, you can turn to transformation power ups to turn the tables on your opponent -- often by turning into your enemies themselves! See where to track down and absorb every enemy's Spirit, and how to learn new extended Transformation Spells.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Myth_Wukong_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Black Myth: Wukong Wiki Sections', specifically from the subsection 'Spirits and Transformation Spells'.
The content is as follows:
When fighting as a Monkey won't cut it, you can turn to transformation power ups to turn the tables on your opponent -- often by turning into your enemies themselves! See where to track down and absorb every enemy's Spirit, and how to learn new extended Transformation Spells.
